nodes.name: ProjectContract

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The project closing date musst be farther then the funding clsoing date"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns the State of the Contract. The Contract can be in one of five States:
1. The Contract was initilized and the creator can add backing option -> INITILIZED
2. The Contract is open and investors can invest. The goal was not reached jet and there is still time to the deadline -> ACTIVE
3. The funding Goal was reached, but there is still time till the deadline -> FUNDINGGOALREACHED
4. The deadline has ended and the funding goal was reached -> DEADLINEREACHED
5. The deadline has ended and the funding goal was not reached -> DEADLINEREACHEDREFUND

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct ProjectContract.BackingOption storage ref[] storage ref

params._optionAmountWei: The amount of Ether the investor has to pay for this backing option in Wei.
params._optionAvailability: The number of investors who can take this option before it is sold out
params._optionDescription: The discription of the new backing option
params._optionTitle: The title of the new backing option

params.backingOptionID: ID of the backing option the investor wants to invest in

params._amountWei: The amount the owner requested in Wei
params._valideUntil: Date till which the request is valide, in seconds since 1970

params._fundingCloseDate: Date where the funding goal need to be met
params._fundingGoal: Goal in Wei there the funding is reached
params._owner: The caller of addNowProject(), which will become the owner of the new ProjectContract
params._projectTitle: The new title for the ProjectContract

getBackingOption(uint256).return: Title of the backing optionDescription of the backing optionPrice in Wei of the backing optionAvailability of the backing optionID of the backing option

getBackingOptionsCount().return: Number of backing options inside the ProjectContracts

getCurrentRequest().return: Title of the requestDescription of the requestTimestamp until the request is valide in seconds since 1970Requested amount of ehter in WeiNumber of votes for acceptNumber of votes for rejectBoolean for if the request was payed out

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params.isAccepted: Bool parameter where true is accpetance and false is rejection of the request

addBackingOption(string,string,uint256,i.notice: Adds a new backing option to the ProjectContract. This is only possible while the backing option adding periode is not over, otherwise an exeption is thown. Only callable by the owner.

addInvestor(uint256).notice: This function adds a new investor to the ProjectContract. It thows an exeption if the adding backing options persiode is not over, the specified backing option wasn't found, the sended ether didn't match the backing options price, the backing option is no longer available or if the investor has already invested. Otherwise the investor is added and the backing option availablity is decresed by one. The sended ether amount is added to the contract.

addRequest(string,string,uint256,uint256.notice: This function allows the owner of the ProjectContract to add an request for payout. As long as a request is active, adding new requests throws an exception. The funding Goal needs to be reached before a request can be requested. _valideUntil musst be in the future, otherwise an exception is throw.

closeAddingBackingOptionPeriode().notice: This function closes the backing option adding periode. After is has been closed it can not be opened again. After the periode was closed, investors are able to invest into the Project Contract.

methods.constructor: Contrutor of the new ProjectContract, usually called by the ProjectContractHub. Creates the new ProjectContract and sets the caller of the addNewProject() function in the ProjectContractHub as the owner of this new ProjectContract.

getBackingOption(uint256).notice: This function returns a specific backing option given an index. It is used in conjunction with getBackingOptionsCount() to retrive all avaiable backing options inside ProjectContracs. It throws exception if the index if larger then the list size.

getBackingOptionsCount().notice: This function return the number of backing options inside the ProjectContract.

getContractState().notice: Returns the State of the Contract. The Contract can be in one of five States: 1. The Contract was initilized and the creator can add backing option -> INITILIZED 2. The Contract is open and investors can invest. The goal was not reached jet and there is still time to the deadline -> ACTIVE 3. The funding Goal was reached, but there is still time till the deadline -> FUNDINGGOALREACHED 4. The deadline has ended and the funding goal was reached -> DEADLINEREACHED 5. The deadline has ended and the funding goal was not reached -> DEADLINEREACHEDREFUND

getCurrentRequest().notice: This function return the current request, throws an exception if no request is currently available, because no request was requested.

getInvestorCount().notice: This function return the number of investors of the ProjectContract

requestPayback().notice: The function allows the payed in ether to by payed back if the funding goal was not reached and the funding periode is over. Anyone can trigger this function.

requestPayout().notice: This function allows the owner to pay out the amount they requested in the request. If the needed vote where not reached or if the request was already payed out, an exceptin is thrown.

voteForCurrentRequest(bool).notice: The function allows the investors to vote on the current request. If the caller of this function is not an investor or this the caller has already voted, an exception is thrown.

userdoc.notice: The ProjectContract is a contract for a specific project, founded by the owner of the contract. Users can invest into the project to become investors. The owner can add new options which tell the user how much ether is needed to become an investor. The owner can make a request to retrive a set amount of ether to use for expenses of the project. The investors can vote on these requests and reject it if they think the reason given is fraudulent.
